quotes.message: Encouragement is awesome. Think about it. It has the capacity to lift a man's or a woman's shoulders. To breathe fresh air into the fading embers of a smoldering dream. To actually change the course of another human being's day, week, or life.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
quotes.name: Flavia Weedn

quotes.message: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.name: John Aughey

quotes.message: It doesn't matter how many say it cannot be done or how many people have tried it before; it's important to realize that whatever you're doing, it's your first attempt at it.
quotes.name: Wally Amos

quotes.message: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
quotes.name: Ralph Emerson

quotes.message: The essential support and encouragement comes from within, arising out of the mad notion that your society needs to know what only you can tell it.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: Follow your dreams, remember you can achieve All that you dream, whatever your mind can conceive.
quotes.name: Birthday Poems

quotes.message: It is also important to realize that adding a positive phrase in words that encourage to your daily routine can only help not hinder.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: A bend in the road is not the end of the roadâ€¦Unless you fail to make the turn.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: You inspire, you put a smile on someone's face, you make someone laugh or deeply touch a person's heart. We all have that in ourselves no matter how tough our journeys are.
quotes.name: Shellie Palmer

quotes.message: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Hope is the foundational quality of all change, and encouragement is the fuel which keeps hope alive.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
quotes.name: William Ellery Channing

quotes.message: Encouragement is the oxygen of the soul.
quotes.name: George Madison Adams

quotes.message: Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever â€“ the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.name: Edmund Hillary

quotes.message: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: When nobody else celebrates you, learn to celebrate yourself. When nobody else compliments you, then compliment yourself. It's not up to other people to keep you encouraged. It's up to you. Encouragement should come from the inside.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Encourage yourself, believe in yourself, and love yourself. Never doubt who you are.
quotes.name: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.message: Encouragement is the most important thing in the world for young people, rather than league tables, which demoralise everyone.
quotes.name: Tony Benn

quotes.message: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Encouragement is food for the heart, and every heart is a hungry heart.
quotes.name: Pat Morley

quotes.message: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Sometimes the best goal you can set is just to get out of bed every day. If you can succeed at this, then other things become possible.
quotes.name: Cynthia Patterson

quotes.message: Everybody needs encouragement, even when things are going well.
quotes.name: Tony Dungy

quotes.message: Encouragement makes a fault easy to correct, and a challenge easy to take on.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: The greatest act of faith some days is to simply get up and face another day.
quotes.name: Amy Gatliff

quotes.message: Some people go through hard times, so bad that they can't even talk about it, but no matter what, we should never give up.
quotes.name: Ifeoluwa Egbetade

quotes.message: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have got it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.
quotes.name: Garrison Keillor

quotes.message: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.name: Maria Robinson

quotes.message: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, then it's not the end.
quotes.name: Ed Sheeran

quotes.message: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you.You may have a fresh start any moment you choose,for this thing we call â€˜failure' is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.name: Mary Pickford

quotes.message: You can have anything you want if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Never let the odds keep you from doing what you know in your heart you were meant to do.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.message: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.name: Hellen Keller

quotes.message: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.name: Epictetus
